stugglingCompetency.name: Expands understanding of concept of addition and acquires the skill of adding three digit numbers with upto three digit numbers [sum within 1,000]
Uses non standard measures to find volume of liquids and capacity of containers and expresses them as 'x' cups or 'y' mugs
Develops an understanding of unit fractions
Understands the idea of an angle and measures an angle using non-standard tools such as cardboard triangle, rhombus etc. Differentiates between different types of angles and names them.
Solves simple and multi step daily life problems that involve more than one operation [for example unitary method]
Applies knowledge of fractions, decimals, measures, units and conversions to solve problems in real life context.
Derives and comprehends the meaning of average and finds average of a set of data
